# History Future Now
## https://www.historyfuturenow.com

Data-driven analysis of the structural forces — demographic, technological, economic — that will shape the next century.
Author: Tristan Fischer
Total articles: 66

## Sections
### Natural Resources (11 articles)
- URL: https://www.historyfuturenow.com/natural-resources
- Energy, food, water, land — the physical foundations that every civilisation depends on.

### Global Balance of Power (15 articles)
- URL: https://www.historyfuturenow.com/balance-of-power
- How nations rise, compete, and decline — from colonial empires to modern China.

### Jobs & Economy (13 articles)
- URL: https://www.historyfuturenow.com/jobs-economy
- Automation, trade, debt, and the future of work in an age of intelligent machines.

### Society (27 articles)
- URL: https://www.historyfuturenow.com/society
- Democracy, religion, migration, identity — the human systems that bind us together.
